text: Robert Rice may refer to: * Robert Rice (footballer) (born 1989), English footballer * Robert Rice (coach), college football coach * Robert H. Rice (1903–1994), American submarine commander * Henry Burr (1882–1941), Canadian singer who used Robert Rice as a pseudonym * Robert L. Rice (1929–2007), health club pioneer and philanthropist * Robert V. Rice (born 1924), American biochemist * Bobby Rice (born 1983), American actor * Bobby G. Rice (born 1944), American country music singer-songwriter
title: Robert Rice
